explanation: The majority of the opinions in the live chat are bullish regarding BTC, referencing price targets above 108k and even 110k. There is some mention of possible short-term volatility, particularly if BTC cannot hold a level above 108k, but overall sentiment is positive. Comments about the fall of the dollar and references to betting big on BTC further reinforce a bullish bias. There is no specific candlestick data, but references to 15-minute and heikin ashi candles suggest attention to bullish momentum.
representative_opinions: jeff gates: seel your house and bet big see you on moon base 7 or rizia

oscartg638: no poly. when dollar goes up btc goes down. when dollar goes down, btc is up.
Alina Bogdan: a big short incoming IF(big IF) we cant hold 108 and close above 109k
oscartg638: the chart you see here is using heikin ashi candle sticks. cleaner than traditional candlesticks.
